titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to The Red Owl: A Legend of the Montauks manuscript 1980.019
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:15:38 +0000.

did.unittitle: The Red Owl: A Legend of the Montauks manuscript
did.abstract: The collection consists of a trypewritten copy of a manuscript poem titled The Red Owl: A Legend of the Montauks. The poem's author is unknown.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); The Red Owl: A Legend of the Montauks manuscript, 1980.019, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Maude Esther Dillard, date unknown.
